attributes.action: intervene to prevent the Post office Ltd from closing four Post Offices in Luton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Post Office Ltd propose to close four Post Offices in Luton: Trinity Road PO, Atherstone Road PO (Luton North constituency), High Town Road PO and Biscot Road PO (Luton South constituency). Their consultation period finishes on 28th August
